SEARCH
Package com.smarthome.tasks

Class Rule

java.lang.Object
com.smarthome.tasks.Rule
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Rule>
public class Rule extends Object implements Comparable<Rule>
The Rule class represents a set of actions to be performed on smart home devices.

      Constructor to initialize a new Rule object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - the ID of the device
      flipState - whether to flip the state of the device
      setPowerLevel - whether to set the power level of the device
      powerLevel - the power level to be set
      groupName - the name of the group of devices
      turnGroupOff - whether to turn off the group of devices
      turnGroupOn - whether to turn on the group of devices
      typeName - the name of the type of devices
      turnTypeOff - whether to turn off the type of devices
      turnTypeOn - whether to turn on the type of devices
      locationName - the name of the location of devices
      turnLocationOff - whether to turn off the location of devices
      turnLocationOn - whether to turn on the location of devices
